question: Saratoga and Yorktown, USA, are the sites of the defeat of which armies?
vanilla_rag_result: Saratoga is the site of the defeat of the British army, specifically General John Burgoyne's forces, who surrendered to American General Horatio Gates on October 17, 1777. Yorktown is also the site of the defeat of the British army, where General Charles Cornwallis surrendered to American and French forces on October 19, 1781.
